00009 void myConsole::Init(int x, int y)
00010 {
00011         console_width = x;
00012         console_height = y;
00013 
00014         GrSetMode(GR_width_height_graphics, console_width, console_height);
00015 
00016         gto.txo_font = &GrFont_PC8x16;//&GrDefaultFont;
00017         gto.txo_fgcolor.v = GrWhite();
00018         gto.txo_bgcolor.v = GrNOCOLOR;
00019         //gto.txo_bgcolor.v = GrBlack();
00020         gto.txo_direct = GR_TEXT_RIGHT;
00021         gto.txo_xalign = GR_ALIGN_LEFT;
00022         gto.txo_yalign = GR_ALIGN_TOP;
00023         gto.txo_chrtype = GR_BYTE_TEXT;
00024         GrEventInit();
00025 }

00044 {

00046         curx = x;
00047         cury = y;
00048         PTYPES_NAMESPACE::scopelock sp(xcomm);
00049         printf(str());

00051         clean();
00052 }

00062 void myConsole::printf(string buf)
00063 {
00064         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < buf.length(); i++)
00065                 printchar(buf[i]);
00066 }

00077 void myConsole::printchar(int c)
00078 {
00079         if ((curx + GrCharWidth(c, &gto)) > GrMaxX())
00080         {
00081                 curx = 0;
00082                 cury += GrCharHeight(c, &gto);
00083         }
00084         else
00085         {
00086                 if (c == '\n' || c == '\r')
00087                 {
00088                         curx = 0;
00089                         cury += GrCharHeight(c, &gto);
00090                 }
00091                 else if (c == '\r')
00092                 {
00093                 }
00094                 else
00095                 {
00096 
00097                         GrDrawChar(c, curx, cury, &gto);
00098                         curx += GrCharWidth(c, &gto);
00099                 }
00100         }
00101 }
00102 void myConsole::DrawImage(int ltx, int lty, int rbx, int rby, int i_type, const char * addr)
00103 {
00104         GrContext *subContext = GrCreateSubContext(ltx, lty, rbx, rby, NULL, NULL);
00105         if (i_type == I_JPG)
00106                 GrLoadContextFromJpeg(subContext, const_cast<char*> (addr), 1);
00107         else if (i_type == I_PNM_BUFFER)
00108                 GrLoadContextFromPnmBuffer(subContext, addr);
00109         else if (i_type == I_PNM)
00110                 GrLoadContextFromPnm(subContext, const_cast<char*> (addr));
00111 }
00112 void myConsole::clrscr()
00113 {
00114         gc.clean();
00115         GrSetContext(NULL);
00116         GrFilledBox(0, 0, console_width, console_height, GrBlack());
00117         GrClearScreen(GrBlack());
00118 }
00119 void myConsole::clearArea(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
00120 {
00121         GrSetContext(NULL);
00122         GrFilledBox(x1, y1, x2, y2, GrBlack());
00123 }
00124 void myConsole::clean()
00125 {
00126         str("");
00127 }
00128 unsigned short int myConsole::KeyRead()
00129 {
00130         do
00131         {
00132                 xcomm.lock();
00133                 GrEventWaitKeyOrClick(&ev);
00134                 xcomm.unlock();
00135         } while (ev.type != 1);
00136         return ev.p1;
00137 }
00138 string myConsole::scan()
00139 {
00140         string s;
00141         do
00142         {
00143                 xcomm.lock();
00144                 GrEventWaitKeyOrClick(&ev);
00145                 xcomm.unlock();
00146                 if (ev.type == 1)
00147                 {
00148                         printchar(ev.p1);
00149                         s += ev.p1;
00150                 }
00151         } while (!(ev.type == 1 && ev.p1 == 13));
00152         string::iterator it = s.end();
00153         --it;
00154         s.erase(it);
00155         return s;
00156 }

00159         GrEventFlush();
